about_the_game:
Demon Lord Army Set 2 is an exciting collection of enemy images and battleback assets!

This package features over 55 enemy images, including an array of fantastic creatures like Aragne, Treant, Hydra, Bicorn, Unicorn, Wolf, Giant Wolf, Chimera, Harpies, Manticore, Goblin, Goblin Archer, Goblin Shaman, King Goblin, Orc, Ogre, Dragon Zombie, and many more. Get ready to bring your battles to life!


Contents:

■ More 55 enemies images (for sideview battle)
■ Multicolour variations 168 types including
■ Face set Images 15 sheet (118)
■ battlebacks1 images x3
■ battlebacks2 images x3

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
Demon Lord Army Set 2 is an exciting collection of enemy images and battleback assets!

This package features over 55 enemy images, including an array of fantastic creatures like Aragne, Treant, Hydra, Bicorn, Unicorn, Wolf, Giant Wolf, Chimera, Harpies, Manticore, Goblin, Goblin Archer, Goblin Shaman, King Goblin, Orc, Ogre, Dragon Zombie, and many more. Get ready to bring your battles to life!


Contents:

■ More 55 enemies images (for sideview battle)
■ Multicolour variations 168 types including
■ Face set Images 15 sheet (118)
■ battlebacks1 images x3
■ battlebacks2 images x3

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
